sentences.en: ...a life-size bronze figure of a brooding, hooded woman.
sentences.cn: …一个真人大小、戴着头巾、正在沉思的女铜像。

sentences.en: "I figure it'sall over."—"Now, now. You did just fine."
sentences.cn: “我想都过去了。”——“好啦，好啦，你做得还不错。”

sentences.en: A hexagon is a six-sided figure.
sentences.cn: 六边形是一种有六条边的几何图形。

sentences.en: a natural ability with figures
sentences.cn: 算术天赋

sentences.en: Alistair saw the dim figure of Rose in the chair.
sentences.cn: 阿利斯泰尔看见了坐在椅子里的罗丝的模糊身影。

sentences.en: anyone thinking of salmon fishing should figure on paying $200 a day.
sentences.cn: 任何想钓大马哈鱼的人都得准备每天付200美元。

sentences.en: Can you figure out this puzzle?
sentences.cn: 你能找到谜底吗?

sentences.en: figured in travel expenses.
sentences.cn: 包含在旅行费用当中

sentences.en: Government figures underestimate the problem.
sentences.cn: 政府的数据对这一问题反映不足。

sentences.en: He looked a forlorn figure as he limped off after 26 minutes.
sentences.cn: 26分钟之后他一瘸一拐地走出来，显得孤单凄凉。

sentences.en: he was trying to figure out why the camera wasn't working.
sentences.cn: 他想弄懂这架照相机为什么失灵了。

sentences.en: His figure is dwarfed by the huge red McDonald'ssign.
sentences.cn: 在巨大的红色麦当劳标志牌下，他显得很矮小。

sentences.en: How do you figure he can live without me?
sentences.cn: 你怎么会认为他没有了我还能活？

sentences.en: I don't have to be a detective to figure that out.
sentences.cn: 我不是侦探也想得出。

sentences.en: I figured on an hour's delay.
sentences.cn: 我估计要延迟一小时

sentences.en: Is this just a figure she plucked out of the air?
sentences.cn: 这是否仅仅是她随口说出的数字？

sentences.en: It’s about 30,000 in round figures (= to the nearest 10, 20, 100 etc ).
sentences.cn: 凑个整数大约是三万。

sentences.en: Janet was a natural blonde with a good figure.
sentences.cn: 珍妮特天生一头金发，身材曼妙。

sentences.en: Let's figure out a way to help.
sentences.cn: 让我们来找出帮助的办法吧

sentences.en: Most women have to watch their figure (= be careful not to get fat ) .
sentences.cn: 大多数女性不得不注意保持身材。

sentences.en: Of course I'm not. It was just a figure of speech.
sentences.cn: 我当然不是，这不过是打个比方。

sentences.en: Reform now figures high on the agenda.
sentences.cn: 眼下，改革是当务之急。

sentences.en: Several leading figures resigned from the party.
sentences.cn: 数位重要人物退出了该党。

sentences.en: She figured that both she and Ned had learned a lot from the experience.
sentences.cn: 她想她和内德都从这次经历中学到了很多。

sentences.en: She has a good figure .
sentences.cn: 她身材很好。

sentences.en: She's always had a good figure.
sentences.cn: 她一向体态秀美。

sentences.en: Since her death, she has become a cult figure.
sentences.cn: 她死后成了部分人狂热崇拜的偶像。

sentences.en: Such a figure is liable to be attacked as a blasphemer.
sentences.cn: 这样的人很容易被人抨击为亵渎神明。

sentences.en: the figure in the background
sentences.cn: 背景中的人物

sentences.en: The figure of seventy-million pounds was twice as big as expected.
sentences.cn: 7,000万英镑的金额是预期的两倍。

sentences.en: The young nurse pulled a face at the Matron's retreating figure.
sentences.cn: 看着护士长离去的身影，这个年轻的护士做了个鬼脸。

sentences.en: They're trying to figure out the politics of this whole situation.
sentences.cn: 他们正试图弄明白整个情形背后的权术争斗。

sentences.en: Today's RPI figure shows inflation running at 10.9 per cent.
sentences.cn: 今天的零售物价指数显示通货膨胀率为10.9％。

sentences.en: We figure on leaving at noon.
sentences.cn: 我们计划中午走

sentences.en: We figured on your support.
sentences.cn: 我们就指望你的支持了

sentences.en: You'll lose your girlish figure if you don't watch out.
sentences.cn: 如果不多加注意，你就会失去女孩般的苗条身段。

words.tran_cn: 借喻的；具有人的形象的；比喻的
比喻的；修饰丰富的；形容多的
华丽的；有形状的；用图画表现的；有图案的
（戏剧电影中的）群众演员；男配角演员
成形；外形；定形；比喻表达法；图案装饰法
以图画或图表描绘；设想（figure的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 动作人物；可动人型；玩具人；活动人
n. 长者；父亲般的人物；领袖
包括：包括，如在计算数量中
(北美，非正式)把…估计在内，估计到，预计到；依赖
解决；算出；想出；理解；断定
了解，估摸，摸熟（某人的行动、动机、个性）
破坏（或保持）体形（或身段）
给…定价（或提供确切数字）

trans.tran_cn: 数字，位数，人影，雕像，体形，知名人士，形象，图，表，几何图形，金额，冰上花样

trans.tran_en: to be an important part of a process, event, or situation, or to be included in something
to be an important part of a process, event, or situation, or to be included in something

trans.tran_cn: 计算； 认为， 猜想
trans.tran_en: to form a particular opinion after thinking about a situation
